lyric.verse: Anata wo Uchiotoshita Watashi no Aoi buki wa Sabite shimatta Yane ni wa Utsurora hato Kanbi na Kotoba dake wo Tabete shimatta Kaeranai Modoranai Nani mo nai Kore ijoo
lyric.chorus: Aa omoide dake Nagarushikanakute Aa togrete shimau Iki mo taedae Hane wa mai agari Tsumo e kaeru
lyric.verse: Aozora Hirugaeshite Hadaketa Shiroi mune wa Kogete shimatta Hataru bi ga Furushikiru Tsui oku wo Sono hate de
lyric.chorus: Aa dakarete ite mo Kitsu wo teinei ni Aa nadete irarenai Moo sugu chinuyo Hane wa moetsukite Sora e kaeru Aa omoide dake Nagarushikanakute Aa togrete shimau Iki mo taedae Hane wa mai agari Tsumo e kaeru Aa dakarete ite mo Kitsu wo teinei ni Aa nadete irarenai Moo sugu chinuyo Hai wa moetsukite Doko e ikoo?
